text:
Ани, хелоуууу 

Приложено изпращам фактура от АНРЕ Румъния  за глоба, която ни е наложена поради забавяне на плащания през годината.
________________________________

From: Alice I <alice.i@almaj.eu>
Sent: Saturday, December 30, 2023 12:06 PM
To: Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com>
Cc: Office <office@tibiel.com>; Office Almaj <office@almaj.eu>; Cosmin T <cosmin.t@almaj.eu>; Christofor <christofor.d@almaj.eu>; Nicoleta Almaj <nicoleta@almaj.eu>
Subject: Fwd: TIBIEL OOD, F PENALIZARE 
 
Dear Nikolay,

Please find attached the invoice issued by ANRE and representing the penalties for delay payment.

Please pay it until 11.01.2024.

I take the opportunity to wish you and Tibiel team a Happy New Year!

Best regards,

Alice

Trimis de pe Outlook pentru iOS <https://aka.ms/o0ukef> 
________________________________

De la: Office Almaj <office@almaj.eu>
Trimis: Thursday, December 28, 2023 2:04:58 PM
Către: Alice I <alice.i@almaj.eu>; Christofor <christofor.d@almaj.eu>
Subiect: Fwd: TIBIEL OOD, F PENALIZARE
